Contact Nubé Rooftop
Whether you’re reserving a table or looking for more information, our team is here to assist you and ensure a seamless experience.
Contact us today, and let us elevate your journey at Fort Lauderdale’s premier rooftop destination, where sunset hues fade to starry nights, and every detail is designed to enchant.

Meet You In The Clouds
Where the sky’s embrace meets ocean’s gaze, atop the 26th floor of the Beach House Fort Lauderdale, a Hilton Resort. Nubé offers panoramic ocean views, craft cocktails & shareable plates.
Inspired by its surroundings, our whimsical menu of crafted cocktails reflects a coastal flair in an atmosphere that seamlessly blends lounge vibes with dining. Our rooftop provides both indoor and outdoor seating options, featuring a wraparound glass balcony and walls that vanish into the breathtaking ocean views.
As sunset hues fade to starry nights, sit seaside on the sky terrace, enjoy an intimate setting at the Solstice Bar and Lounge, and embrace the sky-high energy at the Lunar Bar, where the outside melds seamlessly with the inside.
Reserve a table for your next night out
RESERVE NOW

Corporate Events in Fort Lauderdale
Nubé Rooftop invites you to elevate your corporate gatherings above the cityscape. Nestled on the 26th floor of the Beach House Fort Lauderdale, A Hilton Resort, our oceanfront sanctuary is a refined retreat where panoramic views, bespoke service, and a serene coastal breeze create an unforgettable backdrop for your business celebrations.
Our rooftop venue sets the perfect stage for everything from intimate executive meetings to grand celebrations, wrapped in the serenity of ocean breezes and panoramic cityscapes. With thoughtfully curated spaces and tailored services, your event unfolds effortlessly within our sky-high oasis, a place where professionalism meets poetic elegance, and every detail is thoughtfully curated to inspire connection and creativity.
Types of Corporate Events We Host
Our rooftop venue is designed to accommodate a wide variety of business occasions, including:
Executive retreats & leadership summits
Team-building experiences
Product launches & brand activations
Holiday parties & celebrations
Networking mixers & client appreciation events
Training sessions & workshops
Corporate dinners and business luncheons
Each event benefits from our refined ambiance, panoramic views, and attentive service, creating a setting where connections deepen and ideas take flight.
Private Event Spaces Designed to Inspire
Nubé Rooftop boasts versatile spaces crafted for business events of all sizes, blending coastal charm with refined sophistication:
Full Venue:
Host up to 240 guests with exclusive access to every sky-high corner of Nubé, ideal for gala dinners, product launches, and large-scale gatherings.
Lunar Bar
: An intimate setting for up to 50 guests, perfect for cocktail receptions or networking mixers amid chic design and captivating views.
Firepit Area
: Cozy and inviting, this space accommodates up to 40 guests, providing a relaxed atmosphere for team-building or casual after-hours events under the stars.
Sky Terrace
: A serene spot for up to 30 guests, where ocean breezes and sky-wide vistas create the ideal backdrop for focused discussions or executive retreats.
Explore our private event spaces through our virtual tour and envision your next corporate gathering elevated to new heights.
Virtual Tour
A Setting Designed for Wonder
High above the shoreline, Nubé Rooftop offers an atmosphere that’s as awe-inspiring as the occasion itself. As the sun dips below the horizon and stars begin to shimmer above, your gathering transforms into an experience, effortlessly elegant and entirely unforgettable.
Every celebration is paired with panoramic views, glowing ambiance, and the gentle rhythm of waves far below.
Why Choose Nubé Rooftop for Corporate Events?
Nubé Rooftop offers more than just a venue, it delivers an unparalleled experience.
Panoramic views of the Atlantic Ocean and city skyline set a breathtaking tone for every moment.
Seamless indoor-outdoor flow allows your guests to mingle effortlessly in spaces filled with natural light and fresh sea air.
Custom culinary creations and artisanal cocktails designed to impress and energize your team.
Prime location atop the Beach House Fort Lauderdale, a Hilton Resort, moments from the beach and the city’s premier hotels.
START PLANNING YOUR CORPORATE EVENT
Ready to Elevate Your Corporate Event?
Fill out the contact form below to connect with our dedicated events team and start planning an unforgettable corporate experience in Fort Lauderdale at Nubé Rooftop, where your success is celebrated among the clouds.
Private Event Software powered by Tripleseat

Rooftop Entertainment & Events
on Fort Lauderdale Beach
Above the shoreline, Nubé offers a setting where moments become memories, framed by endless sky and shimmering sea. Enjoy gatherings that celebrate taste, music, and connection, where sunsets unfold in gentle hues and each evening is crafted to linger beautifully in your memory.
Upcoming Events
Nubé’s calendar features a rotating collection of refined experiences designed to surprise and delight. From melodic evenings to inspired culinary moments, each event is shaped by the rhythm of the ocean and the glow of our rooftop setting.
Monthly Lunar Rising Full Moon Parties
Celebrate under the sky’s brightest glow with an evening of crafted bites, spirited cocktails, and coastal inspiration as the full moon ascends.
September 7th
October 7th
Halloween Cocktails
October 13–21
Dare to drink in the dark side with our Nightmare Manor–inspired cocktails. Each hauntingly crafted sip teases the senses with spooky elegance, setting the stage for Halloween at Nubé.
Nightmare Manor
October 31
Step into the clouds for a hauntingly chic Halloween soirée. With eerie beats, sky-high vibes, and cocktails to match, Nube becomes your Nightmare Manor for one unforgettable night.
Fort Lauderdale International Boat Show
October 29 – November 2
Set your sights sky-high during Boat Show week. After a day of exploring the docks, come drift above it all at Nubé. Sip handcrafted cocktails, enjoy elevated bites, and soak in sweeping oceanfront views as Fort Lauderdale’s most iconic week takes over the city.
RESERVE NOW

Private Events in Fort Lauderdale
Nubé, a celestial haven perched atop the 26th floor of the Beach House Fort Lauderdale, A Hilton Resort, where the oceans embrace meets the boundless sky. Vast open spaces that seem limitless with glass balcony and walls that disappear into the oceanic views.
Ascend to unparalleled heights with our exclusive event spaces, including the intimate Lounge, Sky Terrace, and Fire Pit area. Whether hosting a breakfast, lunch, sunset cocktail reception, or soirée under the stars, our venue provides an ideal setting for gatherings ranging from 20 to 240 guests.
BOOK NOW
Our Private Event Spaces
Nubé Rooftop offers versatile private party venues in Fort Lauderdale, accommodating gatherings of all sizes. From intimate groups of 30 to full-venue events for up to 240 guests, we have the perfect private event space to suit your needs.
Full Venue - 240 guests
Lunar Bar - Up to 50 guests
Firepit area - Up to 40 guests
Sky Terrace - Up to 30 guests
Explore our private party spaces to find the ideal setting for your next event in our virtual tour.
VIRTUAL TOUR

Private Event Software powered by Tripleseat
Private Event FAQs
How far in advance should I book my private event?
We recommend booking at least 4–6 weeks in advance to secure your preferred date and time, especially during peak season.
Is there a food and beverage minimum for private events?
Yes, food and beverage minimums vary depending on the date, time, and space reserved. Contact our events team at 954-525-9001 for specific pricing.
Can I bring my own decorations?
Yes, outside decorations are allowed, but they must be pre-approved by our events team. Open flames, confetti, and adhesives that may damage surfaces are not permitted.
Do you provide catering and bar services?
Yes, we offer customized catering and bar packages to enhance your event experience. For additional information, contact the Events team at 954-525-9001.
Is there a weather contingency plan for outdoor events?
Yes, we have contingency options available in case of inclement weather. Our team will discuss alternative arrangements with you when booking your event.
Is parking available for guests?
Yes, valet parking is available at the Beach House Fort Lauderdale, A Hilton Resort. Additional parking options may be available nearby.
Do you offer AV equipment for presentations or speeches?
Yes, we provide AV equipment, including microphones and screens, upon request. Please let us know your requirements in advance.
